about_the_game:
Try to survive 60 seconds against an endless onslaught of especially persistent and cranky gun-toting, knife wielding robots in three unique rooms in Bad Bots: Challenges.

· PRACTICE - This is the Easy mode and, like the name says, is just so you can get your guns warmed up.
· RUSH - The difficulty is bumped up to Medium. The robots are crankier, explosive mines drop to help and your top scores are recorded.
· PANIC - These bad ‘bots are not playing around. Better mine drops, top scores recorded and the difficulty is dialed up to, “OH, CRAP!”
